trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of a memory block allocated from the internal library heap

seg-source.mrk: Retrieves the size of a memory block allocated from the internal library heap

target.mrk: Retrieves the size of a memory block allocated from the internal library heap

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the valid memory block whose size to be retrieved.

seg-source.mrk: A pointer to the valid memory block whose size to be retrieved.

target.mrk: A pointer to the valid memory block whose size to be retrieved.

trans-unit.source: The size of the specified memory block, in bytes.

seg-source.mrk: The size of the specified memory block, in bytes.

target.mrk: The size of the specified memory block, in bytes.

trans-unit.source: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

seg-source.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

target.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

trans-unit.source: The _WinAPI_GetMemorySize() function accepts only the pointers returned by some _WinAPI_* functions (see description).

seg-source.mrk: The _WinAPI_GetMemorySize() function accepts only the pointers returned by some _WinAPI_* functions (see description).

target.mrk: The _WinAPI_GetMemorySize() function accepts only the pointers returned by some _WinAPI_* functions (see description).
